biotools.summary: ATACgraph is a simple and effective software for the analysis of ATAC-Seq data. It contains 12 analyses to profile (epi)genome. ATACgraph utilizes peak BED files and BigWig files generated by callPeak module to compute peaks abundances between two samples.
